DOC.brief_summary: To investigate 5-hour acute effect energy expenditure , substrate oxidation ad libitum food intake intake Metobes-compound ( green tea extract , capsaicin , tyrosine , caffeine ) . Furthermore , investigate effect Metobes-compound inhibit block β-adrenergic receptor . The effect Metobes-compound investigate : 1 . 5-hour energy expenditure respiratory quotient ( ventilate hood ) . 2 . 5-h change blood pressure heart rate 3 . 5-h change sympathetic/parasympathetic ratio . 4 . Ad libitum energy intake . 5 . Self-reported postprandiel appetite sensation ( VAS ) .
DOC.brief_title: B181 Metobes-III : Weight Loss Maintenance New Bioactive Compound ( Metobes-Long )
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects 22 healthy Danish overweight obese men ( BMI 25 35 kg/m2 ) , 18 50 year age . All subject must weight stable ( within  3-kg ) 2 month prior study inclusion , non-smoking , non-athletic daily use medication . Method The study design 4-way crossover , randomise , placebo control , double-blind study . Each treatment separate > 1-week washout period . The treatment consist : 1 . Bioactive Metobes compound ( green tea extract , tyrosine , caffeine capsaicin ) without calcium together 5 mg propranolol . 2 . Bioactive Metobes compound ( green tea extract , tyrosine , caffeine capsaicin ) without calcium together 10 mg propranolol . 3 . Bioactive Metobes compound ( green tea extract , tyrosine , caffeine capsaicin ) without calcium together placebo tablet propranolol ( microcrystalline cellulose ) . 4 . Placebo Metobes compound ( microcrystalline cellulose ) together placebo tablet propranolol ( microcrystalline cellulose ) . On test day body weight composition assess . All subject undergo 5-h post dose assessment energy expenditure indirect calorimetry ventilate hood . Subjective appetite sensation , ECG dual measure blood pressure/heart rate assess every 30 minute . After complete respiratory measurement subject serve ad libitum lunch meal ( pasta salad ) . All subject shall collect urine excrete respiratory measurement . Urine sample analyze nitrogen content content catecholamine .
DOC.criteria: 21 healthy Danish normalweight obese men ( BMI 20 35 kg/m2 ) , 18 50 year age . All subject must weight stable ( within  3kg ) 2 month prior study inclusion , nonsmoking , nonathletic daily use medication . They exclude meet inclusion criterion and/or blood pressure 165/95 mmHg and/or ECG abnormal .
